FuncDef: This command enables loop-free alternate (LFA) computation by SPF under the OSPFv2 routing protocol instance.

ParaDef.Info: specifies the integer used to limit the search of candidate P- and Q-nodes in the remote LFA by setting the maximum IGP cost from the router performing the remote LFA calculation to the candidate P- or Q-node. Values-0 to 4294967295.
